name: CandidATS
short_description:
CATS development as open source has been stopped at 2008. OpenCATS continued the deveopment. But concentrated on OSATS. So we are continuing the project from OpenCATS 0.9.1.

CandidATS is a leading free open source php based applicant tracking system.

Demo        : http://auieoerp.com/demo
Discussion : http://candidats.auieo.com

Upgrade/Migration from CandidATS/OpenCATS 0.9.1.
1) backup the changes made in the CandidATS/OpenCATS 0.9.1
2) Copy and replace the old source code. Take a backup of your old config.php before replacing the code.
3) update the changes carefully

No change will be in database until version 1.9.0

Next Release is CandidATS1.4.0RC3

For donation, use https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=7UYQLRQXLDB9W.

Mail us to info@unicomtech.in for contribution
